SELECT *, (6371*acos(cos(radians(#{latitude}))*cos(radians(latitude))*cos(radians(longitude) -radians(#{longitude}))+sin(radians(#{latitude}))*sin(radians(latitude)))) AS distance FROM quest NATURAL JOIN success WHERE id = #{id} AND yesOrNo = 0
HAVING distance <= 0.03
ORDER BY distance LIMIT 0,300
